name: Live Lives SS: Brothers Forever
description:
• The game is developed by only 1 person.
  • Donations are highly and gladly appreciated! You guys help me work on the full version of the main series of 'Live Lives' quicker. I promise you! Thank you so much, people! >~<
  • It's a full version game. Let me know how you value my game I worked so hard by donating. Thank you very much!
  • Game description
    • One year ago before Rythe gets interested in being part of a private organization to be a ranger. Yar has a visitor at his house. The visitor is actually Rythe because he usually or sometimes comes over to Yar's house to have some fun together. Sadly, on that day, Rythe feels gloomy. He thinks he made Yar sad after a small accident that Rythe just did. Then Yar gotta do something with it. Let's see what it is gonna be!
    • Controls
      • Up = Up arrow key
      • Down = Down arrow key
      • Left = Left arrow key
      • Right = Right arrow key
      • Menu = X or ESC
      • Confirm = Z or Enter
      • Cancel = X or ESC
      • Run/Dash = LShift or RShift
      • F5 = Toggle full screen
      • F6 = Change aspect ratio
      • F12 = Reset
      • Live Lives: https://ourteamxvg.wixsite.com/livelives
      • Live Lives OST: Live Live OST on YouTube
      • GlueZilla (Community Publisher): https://discord.gg/jnPK8J8
